scheme_name: Grant for Incubation Centers within Educational Institutes Scheme
description: This scheme in Goa provides grants to educational institutions to establish incubation centers to promote innovation and entrepreneurship among students. The scheme aims to foster a startup ecosystem within colleges and universities.
key_features: Grants for setting up incubation centers

benefits.grant_amount: Varies based on institution and proposal
benefits.coverage: Infrastructure, equipment, and operational costs for incubation centers

education_criteria: Educational institutions offering higher education (colleges, universities)
Must have a proposal for an incubation center
additional_criteria: Institution must be located in Goa
Must be recognized by UGC, AICTE, or equivalent
institution_criteria: Recognized colleges and universities in Goa

eligible_courses_delhi: Not applicable (scheme supports infrastructure, not specific courses)

steps: Obtain application form from the Goa Department of Education or relevant authority
Submit detailed proposal for incubation center
Verification and evaluation by the department
application_process.note: Contact the department for application guidelines

special_notes: Scheme supports institutions, not individual students
Grant amount depends on the proposed incubation centerâ€™s scope
Aimed at fostering entrepreneurship and innovation
